name: Keyboard Enthusiast Simulator
description:
Keyboard Enthusiast Simulator Same Building experience, Minus all the Hassle

Create your own keycap set - Design your keyboard with editable modifiers, accents, and alpha keys.

Donations -Please consider donating as it helps me complete current projects and allows me to work on newer and more ambitious projects like my post-apocalyptic Tactical shooter currently in its alpha phase of development. Donations are as small as £1 can make a massive difference in the grand scheme of things.

Important Notice: The game is still in early access and is subject to change.

Posts

Patch Notes (Update 1)

  • Improved backdrop
  • Post-Processing Improvement e.g. lens flares and camera filters
  • Improved Textures e.g. PCB, Plate, etc
  • Metallic slider fixed and now hides with menu
  • UI SFX added
  • Ui value slider no longer goes black when at the bottom and shows colour
  • Main Menu Text Updated with a new font
  • Frame drops after moving through menus, is currently being worked on and should be fixed by next patch.
